constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 88 (Thursday, May 20, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. MURPHY of Florida:
H.R. 3427.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, which gives Congress the power to
lay and collect taxes and to regulate commerce among the
several states.
[Page H2654]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to include expenses for certain nonathletic supplies in the above-the-line deduction for eligible educators, and to allow such deduction to interscholastic sports administrators and coaches.
